participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and creative, with a passion for art and a deep love for family.
participant_1.background: I am resilient and intelligent, thanks to my mom and my love for reading. I saw a blue whale when I went to the aquarium. I've got a pretty big collection of old music records that I like to show my kids. I have a masters degree. I enjoy relaxing in the low tide and thinking about my family.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Curious and enthusiastic, with a playful spirit and a love for adventure.
participant_2.background: I am new to my job, but I have been fascinated by ghosts since graduating from Princeton. I can do convincing bird calls. I graduated college for secondary English education. My favorite activity is fishing. I live with my husband and two children.

content.text: Hi! I am interested in ghosts.
Me too! I have been fascinated by them since graduating from Princeton.
That is a great school. I have a masters degree.
That's impressive! What are you doing with your degree?
I am an artist and I enjoy relaxing in the low tide and thinking about my family.
That sounds relaxing! I love fishing. I live with my husband and two children.
I have a pretty big collection of old music records that I like to show my kids.
That's great! I can do convincing bird calls.
I bet it is! It sounds like we have a lot in common.
We do! I'm glad I met you.
Me too! I'm looking forward to talking to you more.
